comment: Absolutely loved this class. While the material was, and probably never will be, that interesting or exciting to learn, it was important, and Professor Fletcher did a great job in teaching it. While there is definitely a solid amount of work that needs to be done, it's nothing crazy. Best online course I've taken, and it's not even close.
Kim is super nice. She goes to great lengths to make sure that you understand the material. Very fair but still challenging. Would take her again.
